SEARCH
Package com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.component

Class Transmission

java.lang.Object
com.huerta.fleetmanagementsystem.model.component.Transmission
public class Transmission extends Object
Represents the transmission component of a vehicle.

OOP concept – Composition: a Transmission is created and owned by its parent Vehicle; it cannot exist independently.

OOP concept – Encapsulation: fields are private with validated setters that enforce business rules (e.g. minimum one gear).
